text: @fisayosoyombo This is the best way to describe @OfficialAPCNg gift to Nigerians. Bello, Ganduje and their likes. How many souls shall you count from BH to herdsmen to bandits, kidnappers and now #covid19. All are almost avoidable deaths. It's good to be alive and get the reward of a choice.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Coronavirus: Human trials for experimental vaccine begin in the US
entity.description:
Pharmaceutical companies Pfizer and BioNTech confirmed the start of human trials for a potential coronavirus vaccine. If successful, the vaccine could be in "emergency use" starting in September, officials say.
